title: Parametric Monkey Primer
author: Paul Wintour (Parametric & BIM specialist, founder of Parametric Monkey)
description: With the release of Rhino.Inside.Revit, a whole range of new interoperability possibilities now exist. We've been working with our clients to integrate Grasshopper scripts with Revit, and developed this quick tutorial to help them get up and running. Hopefully it helps you too

title: Rhino.Inside.Revit Happy Hour Webinar
author: Marcello Sgambelluri, PE, SE
description: Marcello shows Rhino.Inside.Revit... That's right, you can run Rhino (and Grasshopper) inside of Revit. Hosted by [The Revit Kid](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6TtKCInvnoU7vLNACZRFrQ)

title: Rhino.Inside.Revit Review
author: Håvard Vasshaug
description: A 5-star presentation from Håvard Vasshaug of the Bad Monkeys group to [Snøhetta](https://www.snohetta.com/). If you know Revit and want to know how your workflow might be improved, watch this

title: Aussie BIM Guru Video Series on Rhino.Inside.Revit
author: Gavin Crump
description: Gavin Crump kicks off a series on Rhino.Inside.Revit with a 5 part series - the new tool which connects Rhino and Revit together! Gavin thinks Grasshopper in Revit is a massive breakthrough for computational designers. In this first part, he covers how to bake out elements from Revit into Rhino using filtering criteria. In the next parts we will cover reading and setting parameter values in Revit

title: Rhino.Inside.Revit with Geometry Gym
author: Geometry Gym
description: This video runs through the basics of Rhino.Inside.Revit and how to get up and running with this exciting new technology. Along with Geometry Gym tools with an eye toward facades and structures

title: How-to-Rhino Tutorial
author: How to Rhino Facebook Group
description: his is a short recap of Rhino.Inside.Revit plugin which allows Revit and other apps to run Rhino and Grasshopper within Revit application. Keep in mind that this works only with Rhino 7 work in progress version. With this plugin, you can easily import and export geometry from Revit to Rhino and Grasshopper and the other way around. As this is a native McNeel development tool, it is going to be a game changer when it comes to having the ability to use parametric modeling techniques in Grasshopper and have all of that work seamlessly in a BIM tool such as Revit

title: SF Computational Design Institute presentation of Rhino.Inside.Revit
author: San Fransisco Computational Design Institute
description: This is a short recap of Rhino.Inside.Revit plugin and Compute technology in Rhino

title: AIA Detroit co.de.D Rhino.Inside.Revit Presentation
author: AIA Detroit co.DE.D Group
description: Rhino.Inside allows you to use Grasshopper directly within Revit. Will this replace Dynamo or enhance it? Join co.de.D as we discuss what Rhino.Inside means for our industry

title: Creating Windows with Rhino.Inside.Revit
author: How To Rhino
description: In this Rhino Inside Revit tutorial, we’re going to create windows in Revit based on geometry input from Rhino and Grasshopper. This method allows the use of both parametric and manual positioning for our families that are being created directly from Grasshopper

title: EvolveLAB covers Rhino.Inside.Revit - Way Faster Wednesday
author: EvolveLAB
description: In this video, we highlight the power of Rhino.Inside.Revit with Grasshopper. We will place adaptive components and floors using rhino inside with grasshopper

title: Solar Analysis with Rhino.Inside.Revit
author: Paul Wintour (Parametric & BIM specialist, founder of Parametric Monkey)
description: One of the most frequent requests I receive is about running solar access analysis within Revit. Despite the fact that it is still quicker and more accurate to export to Grasshopper, run the analysis and push the results back, many still prefer to stay within Revit. So I decided to do a quick proof-of-concept and I'm proud to announce that it works perfectly using Rhino.Inside.Revit

title: Intro to Rhino.Inside.Revit
author: Rethinking BIM
description: This video provides an intro to some of the capabilities of Rhino.Inside.Revit

title: Room Data and View Analysis with Rhino.Inside.Revit
author: Rethinking BIM
description: This video goes through a workflow that uses Rhino.Inside and the View Rose tool in Ladybug (Grasshopper plugin) in order to demonstrate the process of running a geometry-focused analysis in Rhino/Grasshopper and feeding results back into a Revit parameter

title: Place Beams in Rhino.Inside.Revit
author: Simply Complex Podcast
description: This this video I show you how to simplify Revit structural beam modeling using an adaptive component and Rhino.Inside.Revit
